trait.name: Superior Caster
entries: The Accursed has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on a spell.

trait.name: Song of Victory
entries: While {@b {@i Bladesong}} is active, the Accursed adds {@b +5} to the damage of melee weapon attacks.

trait.name: Arcane Recovery (Once per Long Rest)
entries: Once per day when the Accursed finish a short rest, the Accursed can choose expended spell slots to recover - up to a combined level of {@b 8}, and none of the slots can be 6th level or higher.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The Accursed has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't be 0put to sleep

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Accursed is an 16th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The Accursed has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: * The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Accursed makes two attacks, or makes one attack and casts a cantrip.

action.name: Shortsword, +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) piercing damage {@i {16 ({@damage 1d6 + 13}) with {@b bladesong}}}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage  {@i {13 ({@damage 1d4 + 11}) with {@b bladesong}}}.

bonus.name: Bladesong (5/Long Rest)
entries: The Accursed can to start the Bladesong, which gives them the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: The Accursed gains a {@b +5} bonus to their AC.
The Accursed's walking speed increases by 10 feet.
The Accursed has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks.
The Accursed gains a {@b +5} bonus to any concentration checks.

reaction.name: Song of Defense
entries: When the Accursed takes damage while their {@b {@i bladesong}} is active, they can expend one spell slot the reduce that damage they take by 5 * the spell slot's level.

reaction.name: War Caster
entries: When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from the Accursed, they can use cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.
